ai-tha-ap242:1.1_0: I used to be in the past.
ai-tha-ap242:1.3_0: I’ve been given the full ordination on one day,
ai-tha-ap242:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap242:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap242:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vāsava.
ai-tha-ap242:6.1_0: The group of nine is finished.
ai-tha-ap242:8.4_0: loved by the lovers of gods.
ai-tha-ap242:8.5_0: winds that blow in the wind,
